In a large saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until tender. Stir in the rice, thyme, salt and pepper.

To make this dish, you need to heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the leeks and fry for 2-3 mins. Add the carrots, potatoes, stock and bay leaf. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 15-20 mins until the vegetables are tender.
